overview: XVIII century. Winter is upon a tiny and remote mountain community. Young Elk, son of the village chief, suffers from an apparently incurable illness. As the adults leave the village looking for a remedy, Elk and a few other kids remain alone. Only then, a sinister entity emerges from their peopleâ€™s legends and begins to torment them. A menace only Elk is prepared to face.
title: The Flame
